website_summaries.verdict: A soft, stretchy nursing cover with multiple uses.
pros: Can be used as a nursing cover, stroller cover, scarf, and more
Keeps baby safe from sun, rain, wind, and bugs
cons: Can be hard to see baby when used as a nursing cover due to the stretchy material

customer_reviews.title: I found that when feeding an infant who doesn't have good head control
customer_reviews.text: It works as intended, except it's very difficult to use as a breastfeeding cover. I found that when feeding an infant who doesn't have good head control, it is difficult to get them to latch because you can't see what you are doing unless you stick your head in the scarf as well. It's better to use a cover that allows you to see what you are doing while staying covered
customer_reviews.author: Atxadri

customer_reviews.title: Too tight for a breastfeeding cover, perfect for carseat
customer_reviews.text: Worked well as a car seat, terrible as a nursing cover. Not a big girl, not a skinny girl. Consider myself average. WAY. TOO. TIGHT. I have nothing up top, it was still too tight. I couldn’t maneuver like we needed to and it wasn’t great out in public when I used it. A large swaddle blanket worked easier for me. Sorry. It was winter and it didn’t breathe and was too hot and cramped for my tiny baby to breastfeed.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected for pumping and breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for pumping and breastfeeding after seeing the great reviews. It seems small for me to use for pumping and breastfeeding. I was hoping that it will be a little bigger. I tried it in private room to see how it is and I don't think I will use it in public. So I was a little disappointed. I think swaddles blanket or poncho style tops may work so much better. I haven't used it as a baby car seat cover so that might work better.
customer_reviews.author: Babharu

customer_reviews.title: Great to Peek in on baby!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s great to peek in on baby. As shown in the photo. I would ONLY use this in the warmer months. You can totally place a blanket over it for when it’s cooler out! I DO NOT RECOMMEND FOR THE COLDER MONTHS! We live where it can get -20 Outside this is not for those times. If you live in a warmer state... this is perfect all year round. It fit about graco carrier, all the way around. And it STAYS DOWN! which is awesome! I don’t use it as a scarf because... no. I’m okay.
customer_reviews.author: Farren

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this as a nursing cover, not a carseat cover or scarf. I don't think it would look good as a scarf. It is useful as a nursing cover and allows me to nurse basically anywhere (today was at a graduation ceremony and later a nice restaurant). It can get a little warm inside and it can be hard for me to see so sometimes I wind up putting it over my own head as well to make sure baby latches proerly, etc. But overall good.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly mom

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again (if I needed to hah)
customer_reviews.text: It’s been nearly two years since I have bought this multi-use cover. I just felt the need to say that I have used this constantly since I’ve bought it and have had no problems whatsoever. It is such a simple yet versatile product that has come in handy more times than I can count, my son loves it- not too thick that it becomes hot and stuffy, not too thin that it becomes cold and see-through- anyways... I was just using it for the gazillionth time today and thought I’d just put that out there. :)
customer_reviews.author: thehunterohana

customer_reviews.title: Easier to use than a blanket
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t use this a whole lot in the first few months while I was struggling with getting used to nursing in front of people. I kept trying to use a blanket instead. My baby would get caught up in the blanket or try to fight it being over his face. This product is so much easier because it has just enough room for you and baby, and it’s clear where you both should be, unlike using a blanket. It’s also stretchy, which is nice for nursing on the go. I used it to feed my baby on a park bench this weekend, and it was honestly lovely to be outside, covered, and sharing a moment with him.
customer_reviews.author: E. Devereaux

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is nice but too hot Inside when breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: It seems nice, the quality of the fabric feels good, however when I first tried to breastfeed my baby in it, it was difficult to get comfortable to start feeding. I would literally stick my head inside to get comfortable before coming back out. While I was in there it would feel hot to me. So I don’t feel comfortable with my baby being under there. Now, when I do use it, it’s only for over the car seat. Since there is no body to body heat and I feel like it breathes better that way.
customer_reviews.author: xathziry perez

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover. I was nervous about buying because of some of the reviews, but I am so glad I purchased it. It covers up everything when I am nursing and the material is nice/stretchy. It doesn't work well as an infinity scarf because it is too tight around the neck, but it can be drapped. Also the material is slick for the high chairs, but we make it work. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: The material is very soft and seems sturdy, and is not see-through, which is important! Update 2/11/19 - had this cover for a year now and we still use it! It’s held up very well this past year and now that we have a toddler on our hands we basically use it as a shopping cart cover. We’ve also used it as a car seat cover as well before we changed our little one to a bigger car seat that stays in the car. Still happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mel P.

customer_reviews.title: Material is warm for mom and baby
customer_reviews.text: I want to start by saying that I love these and have several. The design is super versatile for a breast feeding mom and for a mom that wants to also keep her baby covered in the car seat. Because it serves both purposes, it is one less thing you have to put in a diaper back. I also loved the colors of this. Unfortunately, the material creates a very warm space which does not work for someone living in warm weather. If they made this color in a cotton material, I would be sold. Just keep in mind the material when purchasing and if that works, it will work great.
customer_reviews.author: glf

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice fabric.
customer_reviews.text: Baby coming in 3 weeks and decided this was my best option. Happy with it so far! It's soft and reasonably thick stretchy fabric. It fits our Britax b-safe 35 easily with a lot extra fabric, and just from trying it on it feels secure and seems like it'll have plenty of room for feeding. I don't think it looks good as a scarf, but that's not what I bought it for so I'm fine with that.
customer_reviews.author: Alan M

customer_reviews.title: Super functional, stylish and versitile - Going to get a second one!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this cover. It's lightweight and easy to manage during feedings and gives me full cover while still allowing me to see my little one. It works well as an infant seat cover and is very cute as an infinity scarf! So versatile and great quality. I plan on buying a second one to have on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ellen Whitney

customer_reviews.title: It's great as a carseat cover to block the sun and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great as a carseat cover to block the sun and wind. Its pretty easy to put on. I used it as a shopping cart cover for the first time the other day, and once you get it all it place, it stays pretty well....baby can kind of pull it off though. As a nursing cover, I would like for it to be a bit more flowy....I'm a bigger girl, so sometimes I feel a little bit "bound-up" with it. Overall, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! It doesn't quite wear as a scarf, but I really didn't care about that. The best thing is how well it folds up in its little bag and fit in the diaper bag. I get complements all the time! Makes breastfeeding in public hassle free and I'm never worried about flashing someone, it lightweight so baby doesn't get hot when eating.
customer_reviews.author: SammTaylor

customer_reviews.title: I love this cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover!! This is the first cover I have owned and it is perfect for being out with my little girl. I love that it is so versatile and that when she is big enough to sit up, I can use it in the shopping cart. It is great for covering her up in her car seat and she doesn't mind it at all when she is nursing ( although depending on where we are nursing, she does get sweaty sometimes) but overall a great product and I love that it has it's own bag to keep it in as well. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LHeisler

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter. She LOVES it! It’s pretty, lightweight, and versatile. Works great as a car seat cover to keep sun and germy people off the little one. It’s stretchy so it’s easy to position baby for feeding and lightweight and soft enough not to bother baby. Can easily fit in a purse or diaper bag without adding a lot of bulk or weight. She likes it so much she ordered a second one to have when this one is in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Bloomberg

customer_reviews.title: I've gifted two!!!
customer_reviews.text: My friend loves this! She uses it to cover up when nursing in public, to cover the car seat when it's super sunny out and it's very easy to wash and grab. She uses it so much I bought another one to gift another friend who's having a baby. Awesome baby shower gift for a very affordable price and gender neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Only One Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Works :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and ended up using it as a car seat cover. It comes in a small bag which I love, I can keep it stored easily in my diaper bag. It’s a nice material, works for our spring weather but probably not the best for snowy cold weather. I ended up buying my brother a similar one for their baby!!
customer_reviews.author: Weitkamp Fam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Omgosh, this was even nicer then we imagined. It is great, clean lines and colors. Well made, washes well. Stretches over the car seat or shopping cart. Then can be used as a cover up to feed your little one and then can be still warn as the scarf.
customer_reviews.author: ShyMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice material and will fit perfectly on the car seat
customer_reviews.text: Nice material and will fit perfectly on the car seat. Don’t see it as a scarf at all, it’s a weird shape. It comes in a same material bag which I thought was very neat.
customer_reviews.author: Sintija DeKok

customer_reviews.title: Great nursing cover+
customer_reviews.text: It works really great as a nursing cover-- covers my mid section front and back. I use it to cover the infant car seat also; it keeps the wind and sun out really well when going to and from the car. It's really soft and stretchy, a little hot sometimes, but I can fan it to move the air underneath. I've gotten many compliments on it, too. :)
customer_reviews.author: T Danielson

customer_reviews.title: Great multipurpose baby tool
customer_reviews.text: I really love and appreciate how useful this is! I use it as a car seat cover in mild weather, have used it as a baby blanket when I didn’t have one, and a nursing cover. It has gotten so much use and is totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Ok nursing cover, great car seat cover!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a nursing cover but found it a little hard to use as a new mom learning how to breastfeed (can't see what's going on and kind of hot). But, started using it as a car seat cover and love it for that!
customer_reviews.author: J & R Scheckman

customer_reviews.title: It is super practical and use it often to protect my baby ...
customer_reviews.text: It is super practical and use it often to protect my baby from the sun when using the stroller and car seat. Don't like that the material is not breathable. If you breastfeed and is warm outside baby gets super sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Kikimom

customer_reviews.title: Really tight while nursing
customer_reviews.text: This cover works really well! If your into scarves it’s super cute and isn’t too tight around the neck. The only problem I had with this cover was it being so tight while I was feeding. My baby had a hard time latching while nursing and so I had to visually see the latch and relatch a couple times and the cover would not allow me to do so. If your baby latches really well without a problem this cover is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought my cover and so far I am very satisfied with my purchase. I have used it as nursing cover, scarf and car seat cover. I mostly use it as a car seat cover which has been fantastic. I am no longer dragging a blanket or having it blow off with the wind. My baby is kept protected from the elements including sunlight. I would recommend others to purchase this product. It is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Plata

customer_reviews.title: Completely covered!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little nursing cover. I can't see baby as well as I would like, but I feel completely covered and comfortable to nurse in public with this! I have not yet used it as a car seat cover but I live in a hot climate. Maybe this would be good for a winter baby?
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

customer_reviews.title: I love this and have gotten so many compliments on it
customer_reviews.text: I love this and have gotten so many compliments on it! Not really sure how to get the whole infinity scarf thing to work, but i love using it as a nursing cover and also as a carseat cover. It blocks baby from the wind, and keeps him quite toasty. It is also a really soft material, and is easy to wash!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and useful
customer_reviews.text: I really love this scarf, its' been a lifesaver for on the go. I have used it to nurse in the park, at the beach and more. It folds without being bulky which is great for the diaper bag and isn't see-thru so you can nurse and not worry. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: got as a gift for my sister. she loves ...
customer_reviews.text: got as a gift for my sister. she loves it for the baby but also is very sensitive to the sun and uses it to cover her arms when driving.
customer_reviews.author: Elynn H.

customer_reviews.title: Not usefull
customer_reviews.text: The material is hard and seems to be not breathable. Hence using this material is risk for the baby. So we haven't used it. we do not recommend this product and also the cost is too high.
customer_reviews.author: Subin David

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great nursing cover! Love that it goes all the way styling your back. Comes in a small carrying bag. Soft And easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great to cover the carrier
customer_reviews.text: I found this difficult to use as a coverup during breast feeding. Material is very soft and I had a hard time keeping it out of the way and allowing me to see in to the baby. But great on the carrier and easy to wear as a cute scarf.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for nursing in public/around family and friends
customer_reviews.text: I love this nursing cover! I had one that only covers your front and hated adjusting it/hated how I couldn't stand up with it since my shirt would not be covering my back. With this, I have complete coverage and I can look down and see my baby! I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and super easy to use and the price is great! I got this for my sister and she’s plus size and this fits over her perfectly with extra room! Super stretchy and goes right back to the original shape. Will order more!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like the fabric
customer_reviews.text: Fabric felt cheap and like polyester. Not very breathable. Liked the pattern and it is useful as a car seat cover. Not for nursing though.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: ... where I got this from they thought this was great.
customer_reviews.text: ordered this for my daughter and gave it to her at her baby shower several of her friends who happen to be new mommies wanted to know where I got this from they thought this was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight nursing cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and was well received. On inspection, the fabric is quite stretchy and lightweight- breathable. Got the 'red' but is more bright pink- pretty with yellow flowers. Comes with a drawstring bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: LarsC

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I've used it as a scarf
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I've used it as a scarf, car seat cover and nursing cover. It gets the most use now as a car seat cover. It was really easy to figure out so don't let that deter you from purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Neshia

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Used item for the 1st time as nursing cover yesterday and it worked fine. I was looking for something that would cover my entire upper body front and back when nursing. I had another cover but it would leave my back exposed. This one drapes around you
customer_reviews.author: cryswebb

customer_reviews.title: Great length, versatile
customer_reviews.text: I like the length of this cover for breastfeeding. I still haven't figured out how to make it look all that great as a scarf... And I wish the material felt less synthetic. It also came with a weird smell that has taken so he washing to get out. But it does well for its purpose, and I like that you can use it for more than just a nursing cover.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love this! It fits perfectly over my car seat ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It fits perfectly over my car seat and is thick enough to where you cant see through it- even with it being stretched out over the car seat. Its also perfect for breastfeeding because the hole on the top is big enough for your head, but small enough to keep things private.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Easiest and coziest nursing cover
customer_reviews.text: This nursing cover is so handy and easy to use when we are out in public. It allows us the privacy we like during nursing sessions and also becomes a cozy car seat cover to shelter my baby from the wind or rain.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel O.

customer_reviews.title: Never falls off
customer_reviews.text: Amazing breastfeeding cover!!! I want to buy another one.... it never falls off while you're breastfeeding your child like the scarf ones .... this has a skirt-shape that makes it stay in place! Super soft and cute print!! Love it!! I have it on the carseat all the time to cover my child when going out them it's handy to use!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Not for hot weather
customer_reviews.text: Not for hot weather. Baby couldn't breath easily and tight. I have a small frame and couldn't easily use
customer_reviews.author: Suzy-Q

customer_reviews.title: Shower gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friend off of her baby shower registry. It arrived in a bubble envelope and item inside was in a plastic bag. The cover itself came folded in a small drawstring pouch made from the same material as the cover. The material feels very soft and looks well sewn. My friend hasn't used it yet but was excited to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: fa7

customer_reviews.title: I love the stretch and how it’s so versatile
customer_reviews.text: I love the stretch and how it’s so versatile. I use this all the time. But the material doesn’t breathe well, so outside in the summer it’s really hot
customer_reviews.author: Nessapier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this nursing cover. It is easy to use and I like that it covers the sides. The material is soft and I’ve used it as a blanket while out. The only downside is it can get pretty hot under it as there is little ventilation compared to covers that don’t go all the way around the body.
customer_reviews.author: GPierre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these!! She breast feeds so is it has helped her, so I bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Nursing Scarf
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Scarf, My Daughter-In-Law Loves It!!! Easy to use & Soooo Many Variations, she says it washes well.. Very Pleased With This Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marie A. Gemma

customer_reviews.title: made a nice baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.text: Hi...i bought it for my daughter in law in Maryland who is due in October. ..she got it in the mail and said it was very nice and she liked it alot. Good quality and she liked the stripes on the cover!
customer_reviews.author: ruthanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cover
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Works great for nursing cover and car seat cover, especially in the warm months when I still want to cover baby from the elements but don't want a heavy blanket. I used mine on a Graco click connect car seat and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Found a different one with better more breathable fabric
customer_reviews.text: I think the fabric is not very breathable. I only use it as a cover for car seat and eventually shopping cart. I would not breastfeed with this item. Found a different one with better more breathable fabric.
customer_reviews.author: DV8

customer_reviews.title: Runs small. Kinda tight. Only used it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs small. Kinda tight. Only used it to breastfeed once. Was to hot and I got frustrated. I just used it to cover baby head and my shoulder. Just lay it on top.
customer_reviews.author: Heavenly Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality and the stripped design
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and the stripped design, it fits very well over the car seat and it's great for nursing in public. The only thing I don't like too much it's how tick the fabric is, but I know it would be perfect for the cold months coming up
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Felt like swimsuit material
customer_reviews.text: Did not feel breathable, was heavy and thick. Cute but sent back.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Not breathable, too small
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Returning this item. I bought this thinking it would be a stretchy breathable fabric, but it isn't breathable at all. It is very soft, but the cover is tight, not loose, and stretches over your arms and baby, with a hole in the top that is hard to keep open to allow the circulation of air. I had to return it because it wasn't practical for the summer at all. The package and online description do not include the description of the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Kay

customer_reviews.title: I really love this nursing cover
customer_reviews.text: I really love this nursing cover, I can hide my head with it while watching my son breastfeeding. I also use it in his car seat if it’s raing or I feel like I don’t want people see him.
customer_reviews.author: Riezel Dow

customer_reviews.title: Gives me piece of mind when we take our newborn out into the public by having her car seat covered.
customer_reviews.text: Love this and highly reccomend. Gives me piece of mind when we take our newborn out into the public by having her car seat covered.
customer_reviews.author: Ashly Deese

customer_reviews.title: Great nursing cover
customer_reviews.text: Great as a nursing cover. Stays on and is lightweight and very soft. Love the cute gender neutral pattern too.
customer_reviews.author: TCB

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Love that it comes with a matching ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Love that it comes with a matching bag for storage. Easy to throw in my purse or diaper bag. Material is nice and cool. Get lots of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: A Gift that is so appreciated
customer_reviews.text: It was quickly shipped and so VERY loved. Material is soft and very easy laundered. Gives plenty of breathing room so baby and Momma do not overheat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst breastfeeding cover ever!!
customer_reviews.text: So hard to use during breastfeeding. Ots too tight and gets extremely hot. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Williams

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cover
customer_reviews.text: I have many covers, but this one is my favorite. My newborn isn’t impressed cause he doesn’t like to eat in the dark but he doesn’t understand about our crazy society yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ranee Crumpler

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat cover, not so great for a breastfeeding coverup
customer_reviews.text: Great design and cute on the car seat . It’s a little snug when I tried to use it as a cover up for breastfeeding. You can’t really peak in from the top and see the baby so you almost feel like you need another pair of hands holding it open from the top .
customer_reviews.author: Ravinder Arceo

customer_reviews.title: Great cover!
customer_reviews.text: My mother got me the striped one as a gift and I loved it so much I had to buy another one! I wear them all day as part of my outfits and I am always prepared to nurse wherever I go. Only cover I've used that works in so many different ways.
customer_reviews.author: Haleigh Opal

customer_reviews.title: Versatile & Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile! I use it in some capacity everyday. It washes well. It's over 1 year and looks like new! I wish the fabric breathed a little better. I have to lift it at the top or bottom to give my little one air. Also, it gets hot under the cover while breastfeeding.
customer_reviews.author: Doc J

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE LOVE LOVE! The black and white stripes have been great because my daughter is really into the contrast (like most babies) but it’s super soft and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Remington

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover to use as a highchair and grocery cart cover for my toddler. It fits nicely on a restaurant highchair, however it does not fit well on a grocery cart. Nice product overall.
customer_reviews.author: MWilkinson

customer_reviews.title: 360* coverage! And cute patterns!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect product! I needed a gender neutral nursing cover and loved the look of this grey one with the arrows! I am so happy about not having to be so worried about limiting my outfits to what I can "access" from the front since I now have full coverage front and back ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Jessika

customer_reviews.title: SO easy to breastfeed in public without feeling exposed
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have purchased this with my last child. SO easy to breastfeed in public without feeling exposed. Very lightweight but no means see through.
customer_reviews.author: Jhal83

customer_reviews.title: I won't be able to use it until my baby is born but I put it on my car seat and it looks great! excited to use it
customer_reviews.text: I just recently got mine in the mail! The shipping was fast and the product seems to be exactly as pictured. Very stretchy and soft. I won't be able to use it until my baby is born but I put it on my car seat and it looks great! excited to use it! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaydsterr06

customer_reviews.title: So useful. Contrasting b&w pattern is great for my baby ...
customer_reviews.text: So useful. Contrasting b&w pattern is great for my baby to look at while sitting inside the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I love how stretchy this is
customer_reviews.text: I love how stretchy this is! Easy and breathable to nurse baby in public on hot days. It's nice and big too so you're not struggling to get baby under and out.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I can at least use it for that if I can get the horrible smell to go away after washing it
customer_reviews.text: Came out of package smelling of strong chemicals. Not made for plus size mom's. Picture shows a loose scarf that covers but isn't constricting. Item that came is stretchy but not at all made for larger than petite mom's. Have to fight to pull stretchable fabric wide enough to fit body and baby. I should have Purchased the one that was $10 less and had reviews saying it was large enough but bought this one because of the pattern and because of the picture of t as a infant carrier cover. Maybe I can at least use it for that if I can get the horrible smell to go away after washing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Soft and strechy!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly soft! I wish I had a blanket made frim the same material. It is very breathable and stretchy. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: This cover is awesome as I was self conscious to nurse in public
customer_reviews.text: This cover is awesome as I was self conscious to nurse in public! But with the cover no one even notices and you can use it as a scarf and over the carseat!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn June

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So nice and thin weight! A little fitted if your on the heavier side but it’s still wearable
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a nursing cover. Haven’t tried it for anything else. The material is light but it’s not quite as “breathable” as I would like. It does make my son sweat a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Like the design and it’s multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: Like the design and it’s multiple uses, but the material makes it so hot for my little guy when he is nursing that I had to stop using. He would get so sweaty under it and it was winter time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover easy to use and covers so well I have older kids so we are always doing something so it's nice to have to feed my new born while we are out.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time when I go out with my baby. No only with the carseat but also with the stroller. It's very helpful to protect him from the environment.
customer_reviews.author: MariaGB

customer_reviews.title: The scarf that gives you privacy and style
customer_reviews.text: I got it as a gift to my sister. She loves the experience of breastfeeding her baby and the breastfeeding scarf is a bonus. She even likes that she can style it as an infinity scarf.
customer_reviews.author: LaKeisha

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality!! Fits car seat nicely. Haven’t used it for breastfeeding but I’m sure it’s probably a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: So many uses and so helpful! Within 36 hours of getting mine, I used it for breastfeeding, a car seat cover, and it rained so I covered him up to keep him dry when running to the car. Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leah P

customer_reviews.title: Not breathable
customer_reviews.text: It’s not at all breathable and makes my baby sweat a lot I have to put my head inside and keep blowing on her face to prevent her from heating up
customer_reviews.author: mahvash hussain

customer_reviews.title: Not for warm climates and its super small.
customer_reviews.text: Material is horrible and not at all suitable for warm climates. I am petite and it is super tight for me and I returned it unsure how my baby will fit in here. Not recommended
customer_reviews.author: mily

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Very private. I suggest using this in a cool dry climate. I live in the South and it was WAY too hot for baby and I in the humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Erdmann

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! It covers the car seat and is always there when you need to nurse in public. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Must have for new mom
customer_reviews.text: Must have for new mom. Wearing it almost 12 hours a day 😊. Very good material after wash looks like brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful, versatile product that covers the stroller and protects against the sun, strong winds, insects, provides sleeping privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Excellent

customer_reviews.title: "Even Daddy Knows How To Use It".... Really I'm the guy buying it maybe not make a statement like we are brainless zombies...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I'm sure the product is fine. But if one of your sales quotes is "Even Daddy Knows How To Use It" maybe think again. I bought the damn thing because it looks like the best option for many cases but boy did I think twice.
customer_reviews.author: Parker W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend. I tried it out and loved it. So soft. . My friend is super excited to try it out once her baby boy comes to the world.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Navarrete

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover . It's a stretchy material and it serves many purposes . I covered my baby when she was too little and I didn't want anybody touching her . It also protects from sunlight hitting her face and the wind on cooler days. However , I lost my cover and I'm very sad !
customer_reviews.author: Lucero Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Soso
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit too small can be a little larger. The material is not very soft
customer_reviews.author: Natalia B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I love it for my car seat full coverage and also for breastfeeding it covers mom well. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Trevino Family

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me & baby covered while he nurses. I’m ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me & baby covered while he nurses. I’m still getting the hang of it, so it’s a little awkward at first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter on her baby shower. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: MindaT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to be discreet and still be part of ...
customer_reviews.text: Very handy especially for first time nursing moms! Perfect way to be discreet and still be part of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Molder

product_meta.title: Baby Nursing Cover for Breastfeeding - 3 Pack Premium Set of Car Seat Canopy & Nursing Pads - Use As Stretchy Scarf, Poncho, Shawl, Wrap Up for Infant Boys & Girls
feature_bullets: ✅ MOST VERSATILE COVER EVER: Breastfeeding cover with stretchy material can be also used as nursing cover, stroller cover, car seat canopy, infinity scarf, shawl and endless other uses.
✅ PERFECT BABY SHOWER GIFT: Great for Boys & Girls with free Pouch Bag, a gift any new mother will appreciate.
✅ 100% PROTECTION FOR YOUR BABY: Protects from sunlight, summer heat, wind & breezes while maintaining your privacy. Keeps your child also safe from mosquitos, bugs, germs, bacteria, and pollen.
✅ BREATHABLE BABY-APPROVED FABRIC: Super light and soft nursing scarf, keeping your baby cool, comfortable and happy while on the go – every time.

✅ WE ARE READY TO HELP YOU ANY TIME: Completely risk-free satisfaction guarantee for 30 days. If anything goes wrong or you need any information about the product, we offer a prompt help from our courteous customer support.

specifications.Safety warning: ► QAQADU baby team always cares for the safety of your infants. Do not leave your baby unattended while covered. Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, lay flat to quickly dry for best results or tumble dry low. Warm iron if needed. Thank you and enjoy! God Bless your babies!
